CANSWE was started on a dream.

Our 27 Retailers, over 10,000 Customers, and 40 years of business have moved us closer to reaching it.

We love our customers, and they love us.

" The Hurricane jacket has been a great purchase for the BC Rap Attack... Our firefighters are safer, and can operate in a greater range of conditions. Our crew is happier and safer with CANSWE garments. "

- Dave Grohl, Ministry of Forests & Wetlands Preservation Barriere, BC
